name: cliza
description: Cliza is a Token Launch Studio built for the ICM (Internet Capital Markets) era. We prioritise endurance over hype and aim to architect impactful token generation events and experiences. Our approach combines strategic tokenomics design with sustainable launch frameworks, ensuring projects achieve long-term market relevance. We partner with innovative teams to create token ecosystems that deliver genuine utility, foster community engagement, and establish lasting value beyond initial market excitement.
